org.itsnat.comp.table
Interface ItsNatTableUI

All Superinterfaces:
ItsNatComponentUI, ItsNatElementComponentUI
All Known Subinterfaces:
ItsNatHTMLTableUI
public interface ItsNatTableUI
extends ItsNatElementComponentUI

Is the base interface of the User Interface of a table body component.

Table cells are managed as a DOM element table, using the current table structure and renderer.

Current implementation does not use the data model and relays heavily on ElementTable.

Rows and column indexes are 0 based.

Author:
Jose Maria Arranz Santamaria
See Also:
ItsNatTable.getItsNatTableUI(), ItsNatTable.getItsNatTableCellRenderer(), ItsNatTable.getItsNatTableStructure(), ItsNatTableHeaderUI

getItsNatTableCellUIAt

ItsNatTableCellUI getItsNatTableCellUIAt(int row,
                                         int column)
Returns an object info of the cell element at the specified row and column.

Parameters:
row - row index of the cell element.
column - column index of the cell element.
Returns:
the object info of the matched table cell element. Null if row or column is out of range. This object is ever the same per cell and may be used to save any context data.
See Also:
getItsNatTableCellUIFromNode(Node), ElementTableBase.getTableCellElementInfoAt(int,int)

getItsNatTableCellUIFromNode

ItsNatTableCellUI getItsNatTableCellUIFromNode(org.w3c.dom.Node node)
Returns an object info of the cell element containing the specified node (or the node is itself an element of the table body).

Parameters:
node - the node to search for.
Returns:
the object info of the matched child element. Null if this node is not contained by the table. This object is ever the same per cell and may be used to save any context data.
See Also:
getItsNatTableCellUIAt(int,int), ElementTableBase.getTableCellElementInfoFromNode(Node)

isUsePatternMarkupToRender

boolean isUsePatternMarkupToRender()
Informs whether the original (saved as pattern) markup is used to render.

The default value is defined by ItsNatDocument.isUsePatternMarkupToRender()

Returns:
true if the original markup is used.
See Also:
setUsePatternMarkupToRender(boolean)

setUsePatternMarkupToRender

void setUsePatternMarkupToRender(boolean value)
Sets whether the original (saved as pattern) markup is used to render.

Parameters:
value - true to enable the use of original markup to render.
See Also:
isUsePatternMarkupToRender()
